stories.original_headline: New catalyst turns carbon dioxide into clean fuel source
stories.original_summary: Researchers have found that manganese, an abundant and inexpensive metal, can be used to efficiently convert carbon dioxide into formate, a potential hydrogen source for fuel cells. The key was a clever redesign that made the catalyst last far longer than similar low-cost materials. Surprisingly, th
stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Discover Magic Stone to Clean Foul Air
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Alchemists' Guild has unearthed a clever new enchantment. They've found that a common metal can purify the foulest air, transforming it into a potent source of pure magic essence. This discovery promises to fuel enchanted lanterns and artifacts across the realm.

stories.original_headline: This unexpected plant discovery could change how drugs are made
stories.original_summary: Plants make chemical weapons to protect themselves, and many of these compounds have become vital to human medicine. Researchers found that one powerful plant chemical is produced using a gene that looks surprisingly bacterial. This suggests plants reuse microbial tools to invent new chemistry. The
stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Ancient Magic in Healing Plants
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards of the Grove have made a wondrous discovery about medicinal plants. They learned that plants craft powerful healing elixirs using ancient mystical patterns, like those found in the smallest, unseen spirits. This suggests plants re-employ forgotten elemental helpers to brew new remedies.

stories.original_summary: Adobe is no longer planning to discontinue Adobe Animate on March 1st. stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Scribes Reconsider Fate of Living Pictures Scroll
stories.fantasy_story: The esteemed Illuminators' Conclave has reversed a recent decree! They will not withdraw the magic from the famed Living Pictures Scroll. Instead, the enchanted artifact will remain under watchful care, receiving ongoing blessings and repairs for its errant enchantments. All scribes can still conjure their animated visions.
